str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of arguros; silvery, i.e. cash; specially, a silverling.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To report, publish abroad. From dia and a derivative of pheme; to report thoroughly, i.e. Divulgate.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.
As far as, until, even to.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Today, now. Neuter of a presumed compound of the article ho and hemera; on the day; generally, now.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
